episodes.title: Mark Fisher and I Discuss Scientology's Epic $100 Million Propaganda Fail.
episodes.description: David Miscavige spent $100 million of his followers hard earned cash promising he'd discovered the ultimate means of spreading the word about Scientology while seeking revenge against his enemies. What they got for their money was a technological marvel that only exists to make shiny fake documentaries, slick infomercials, and produce fund raising events to capture even more of their cash as they are gaslit into believing they are saving the world.

episodes.title: Chapter 13: A Scientific Basis For Hate
episodes.description: The so called Emotional Tone Scale, Scientology Founder L. Ron Hubbard's categorization of all possible human emotion, is one of the foundational works upon which all Scientologists form their view of the world and which they accept as scientific fact. Among many other things, it forms the scientific basis for the hared of the LGBTQIA+ community.

episodes.title: Chapter 12: Cultural Attitudes
episodes.description: Join me for chapter 12 of Scientology the Big Lie, Cultural Attitudes. Marvel at the sheer level of racism, homophobia, and misogyny expressed in Hubbard's so-called "technical training films."

episodes.title: Mitch Brisker is live With Tory Magoo
episodes.description: Join us for a lively discussion of all things Scientology.

episodes.title: THE Q & A
episodes.description:
Let’s address all those BURNING questions from our last conversation.

episodes.description:
@OhnoNora and I are having a one-on-one and you get to see it unfold LIVE

COMMENTS WILL BE TURNED OFF so that we can have a much needed conversation.

COMMENTS WILL BE OPEN immediately after on both pages. 

THIS WILL NOT BE A DEBATE. No winner will be crowned. Our goal is to bridge the generational gap at the core of the conflicts within the anti-scientology community on YouTube.

episodes.title: Chapter 8: In the Land of the blind
episodes.description: Join me as I read chapter 8 of Scientology The Big Lie. Hear never before shared insights into the inner workings of Scientology's failed in-house production company--Golden Era Productions.

episodes.description: What's it like to be love bombed into working for a cult? A unique, never before revealed perspective on the inner workings of the one-time home of Scientology's global effort to take over Earth.

episodes.title: The Normalization of Emotional Abuse
episodes.description: How does the emotional abuse you are willing to put up with hide in plain in sight? Why does some forms of chaos feel normal, even desirable? The answer explains why people stay in cults and why they keep engaging in the same types of toxic relationships over and over.

episodes.title: Marc & Mitch Make a Scientology FIlm #13 "Ron Saves Africa"
episodes.description: Nazi Propagandists, Racists, L. Ron Hubbard as the White Savior of Africa. This episode has something for everyone.

Join me as I read chapter 5 from my book Scientology The Big Lie: How I Made an Evil Cult Look Good, "Glory Days."

episodes.title: Chapter 4: Finding Scientology
episodes.description: How I wound up at the doorstep of Celebrity Centre.

episodes.title: Chapter 3: Honey Drive
episodes.description: The final pivotal chapter before I wind up at the doorstep of Scientology.

episodes.title: Summer of Love
episodes.description: More book talk. Gonna read from chapter 2 of Scientology the Big Lie. Journey with me back to the Bay Area, 1967: the music, the drugs, the politics, and a little art school confidential.

episodes.title: More Book Talk: Chapter 1
episodes.description: Join me as we unpack the contents of Scientology The Big Lie. The reasons, the wherefores, and the whatevers behind the book.

episodes.title: The Story Behind the Book Scientology The Big Lie
episodes.description:
Join me for a frank discussion covering how this book came to be, why I wrote it, it's content, and the process of writing this type of memoir. 

I'll also be doing a reading of the front matter.

episodes.title: Life After Scientology
episodes.description: Join me for a conversation with second generation Scientologist Julie McKernan as we discuss life after Scientology

episodes.title: Julie McKernan the Final Chapter
episodes.description: Join me or part 3 of my interview with Julie McKernan as she relates the final days in Scientology and the details of her final departure. Watch till the end because you're not going to believe.

episodes.title: Julie McKernan Interview Part 2
episodes.description:
In Part 2 we hear about Sea Org secrets Julie's mother revealed to her after leaving Scientology, her journey from being a professional electrician to earning a career as an art director and prop master in the film business, and maintaining her 26 year long marriage to a husband who didn't care to have anything to do with Scientology.

https://linktr.ee/mitchbrisker

episodes.title: Born-in Scientologist Speaks Out for the First Time
episodes.description:
Meet Julie McKernan, born to Class VIII auditor parents, Julie's mother worked directly under "Commodore" Hubbard during the formative days of the tiny fake Navy know as the Sea Organization. Julie went on to achieve the state of OT4 and is a Class 6 auditor, what Hubbard referred to as the "Dukes of the Auditor Elite".

Julie speaks out for the first since leaving Scientology in 2020.

episodes.title: The Bizarre History of Scientology "Super Bowl Ads"
episodes.description: Join me for a post game deep dive into the bizarre history of how Scientology came to show ads (in some markets) on the Super Bowl.

episodes.title: Larry Anderson Speaks Out on His Starring Role in Orientation
episodes.description: Join me and my co-host Jeffrey Augustine as we welcome veteran actor and Scientology whistle blower Larry Anderson to discuss his landmark work on the Scientology film "Orientation."

episodes.title: Scientology Versus Public Opinion
In Their Own Words, Scientology is an Extremist Organization
episodes.description: Scientology's Coded Extremist Language Explained.

episodes.title: Anti-Government Scientology Propaganda
episodes.description: Join me as I break down another propaganda film I made for Scientology.

episodes.title: Who do Laws Protect According to Scientology?
episodes.description: I react to another propaganda film I made for the Scientology TV Network.

episodes.title: Everything You Never Needed to Know About Communication
episodes.description: More crazy Hubbardism on just how lost humanity would be without his unique insights into the anatomy of how to communiate.

episodes.title: How Scientologists Are Spoon Fed Human Behavior - Part 2
episodes.description: Plagiarized from psychology, Hubbard puts forth his dogma on human behavior.  The black and white world of Scientology. My reaction to the propaganda film.

episodes.title: How Scientologists Are Spoon Fed Human Behavior
episodes.description: Plagiarized from psychology, Hubbard puts forth his dogma on human behavior.  The black and white world of Scientology. My reaction to the propaganda film.

episodes.title: Scientology's Biggest Excuse for its Own Troubles
episodes.description: How Scientology Indoctrinates its Members to Persecute Each Other

episodes.title: The Generation Gap in the Ex-Scientology Community
episodes.description: Join Sterling Tomkins and me for conversation about the generation gap in the ex-scientology community and a couple of other topics.

episodes.title: Scientology is Officially Considered a Cult In Germany.
episodes.description: The good folks at PROSieben stopped by for a little chat. They get it, Scientology is a global crime scene happening in real time. And they love shooting their interviewees making coffee (its happened with two German crews), but the crew from PPROSieben was terrific, loved working with them. Most important, I'm doing what I can to get the message out.

episodes.title: Pigs at the Trough
episodes.description: For decades Scientology has used covert bribery and corruption sometimes clandestine, sometimes out in the open. Whether with gifts, or money, the aim is to influence decision-makers and gain unfair advantages. It is Quid pro quo.  SCN wants safety and safe passage in return.

episodes.title: My Journey from Thanklessness to Thankfulness
episodes.description: I have a book coming out tomorrow. How I got there after sitting on my sofa for a year and a half contemplating me demise is an amazing story. And I have many of you to thank for that.
